Other Plotting module

Module to create complex graphics using matplotlib and plotly

utils.otherplotting.getFastSolutionEvolutionAnimationPlotly(solution_evolution: List[SolutionCvrp], depot_node_color: str = '#a6f68e', node_size: int = 15, route_color: List[str] = ['#FF0000', '#0000FF', '#00FF00', '#E67300', '#9900cc', '#F0b8b8', '#72A0C1', '#008000', '#FFBF00', '#008080', '#000080', '#FFFF00', '#00FFFF', '#BDB76B', '#006400', '#6495ED', '#90EE90', '#800080', '#F0b8b8', '#FF69B4', '#F4A460', '#FFE4C4', '#40E0D0', '#FF8C00', '#FFD700', '#8FBC8F', '#ADD8E6', '#BA55D3', '#E6E6FA', '#D2691E', '#CC99CC', '#191970', '#ADFF2F', '#FF7F50', '#9900FF', '#FFCCBC', '#808080'], show_legend_edge: bool = True, show_legend_node: bool = False, slider_from_end: bool = True) → Figure

getSolutionEvolutionAnimationPlotly()

Function to create animation figure of solution evolution

Parameters

  • route_color – List of colors of the routes in the solution, default the DEFAULT_COLOR_PALETTE (utils.colorpallete) (opt.)

  • depot_node_color (str) – Color of the node depot, default to “#a6f68e” (opt.)

  • node_size (int) – Size of the nodes, default to 15 (opt)

  • show_legend_edge (bool) – Display or not the legend of edges, default to True (opt.)

  • show_legend_node – Display or not the legend of nodes, default to False (opt.)

  • slider_from_end (bool) – True if the animation should start at the last frame

Tyoe route_color

List[str]

Returns

Animation Figure of the solution evolution

Return type

Figure

utils.otherplotting.getHtmlLineCostEvolution()
Parameters

  • cost_evolution (List[float]) – cost evolution during the algorithm

  • title (str :param full_html: If True, produce a string containing a complete HTML document starting with an <html> tag. If False, produce a string containing a single <div> element. Default to True (opt.)) – Title of the figure, default to “” (opt.)

  • default_width (str) – he default figure width/height to use if the provided figure does not specify its own layout.width/layout.height property. May be specified in pixels as an integer (e.g. 500), or as a css width style string (e.g. ‘500px’, ‘100%’). Default to “100%” (opt.)

  • default_height – The default figure width/height to use if the provided figure does not specify its own layout.width/layout.height property. May be specified in pixels as an integer (e.g. 500), or as a css width style string (e.g. ‘500px’, ‘100%’). Default to “100%” (opt.)

Returns

html code of the line chart of the cost evolution

Return type

str

utils.otherplotting.getHtmlSolutionEvolutionAnimationPlotly()

Function to create animation figure of solution evolution

Parameters

  • route_color – List of colors of the routes in the solution, default the DEFAULT_COLOR_PALETTE (utils.colorpallete) (opt.)

  • depot_node_color (str) – Color of the node depot, default to “#a6f68e” (opt.)

  • node_size (int) – Size of the nodes, default to 15 (opt)

  • show_legend_edge (bool) – Display or not the legend of edges, default to True (opt.)

  • show_legend_node – Display or not the legend of nodes, default to False (opt.)

  • full_html (bool) – If True, produce a string containing a complete HTML document starting with an <html> tag. If False, produce a string containing a single <div> element. Default to True (opt.)

  • default_width (str) – he default figure width/height to use if the provided figure does not specify its own layout.width/layout.height property. May be specified in pixels as an integer (e.g. 500), or as a css width style string (e.g. ‘500px’, ‘100%’). Default to “100%” (opt.)

  • default_height – The default figure width/height to use if the provided figure does not specify its own layout.width/layout.height property. May be specified in pixels as an integer (e.g. 500), or as a css width style string (e.g. ‘500px’, ‘100%’). Default to “100%” (opt.)

Tyoe route_color

List[str]

Returns

Html code of the animation figure

Return type

str

utils.otherplotting.getLineCostEvolution()
Parameters

  • cost_evolution (List[float]) – cost evolution during the algorithm

  • title (str) – Title of the figure, default to “” (opt.)

Returns

Line chart of the cost evolution

utils.otherplotting.getSolutionEvolutionAnimationPlotly()

Function to create animation figure of solution evolution

Parameters

  • route_color – List of colors of the routes in the solution, default the DEFAULT_COLOR_PALETTE (utils.colorpallete) (opt.)

  • depot_node_color (str) – Color of the node depot, default to “#a6f68e” (opt.)

  • node_size (int) – Size of the nodes, default to 15 (opt)

  • show_legend_edge (bool) – Display or not the legend of edges, default to True (opt.)

  • show_legend_node – Display or not the legend of nodes, default to False (opt.)

  • slider_from_end (bool) – True if the animation should start at the last frame

Tyoe route_color

List[str]

Returns

Animation Figure of the solution evolution

Return type

Figure

utils.otherplotting.showSolutionEvolutionAnimationMatplotlib(solution_evolution: List[solution.cvrp.solution.SolutionCvrp], with_labels: bool = True, route_color: List[str] = ['#FF0000', '#0000FF', '#00FF00', '#E67300', '#9900cc', '#F0b8b8', '#72A0C1', '#008000', '#FFBF00', '#008080', '#000080', '#FFFF00', '#00FFFF', '#BDB76B', '#006400', '#6495ED', '#90EE90', '#800080', '#F0b8b8', '#FF69B4', '#F4A460', '#FFE4C4', '#40E0D0', '#FF8C00', '#FFD700', '#8FBC8F', '#ADD8E6', '#BA55D3', '#E6E6FA', '#D2691E', '#CC99CC', '#191970', '#ADFF2F', '#FF7F50', '#9900FF', '#FFCCBC', '#808080'], depot_node_color: str = '#a6f68e', show_weight: bool = False, route_to_display: Optional[List[int]] = None, node_size: int = 300, auto_node_size: bool = False) → None

showSolutionEvolutionAnimation()

Function to create an animation of best solution evolution

Parameters

  • solution_evolution (List[SolutionCvrp]) – List of solution evolution

  • with_labels (bool) – Display or not the name of the nodes (node id), default to True (opt.)

  • route_color – List of colors of the routes in the solution, default the DEFAULT_COLOR_PALETTE (utils.colorpallete) (opt.)

  • route_color – List[str]

  • depot_node_color (str) – Color of the node depot, default to “#a6f68e” (opt.)

  • show_weight (bool) – True if the weight should be displayed on the edge, else False. Default to True (opt.)

  • route_to_display (List[int]) – Number of the routes to display on the solution (route number start at 1), default to None (opt.)

  • node_size (int) – Size of the nodes

  • auto_node_size (bool) – Set the size of the node automatically
